name: AXL: Full Boost
description:
TouchArcade: "If fast and frenetic racing is for you, look no further". 4/5

148Apps: "Featuring everything from immersive environments to an expansive campaign, AXL: Full Boost is a game that is well worth checking out." 4/5

The App Shack: "It could very well wind up being the best racer available for the iOS, maybe even one of the best racers available on any gaming platform." 5/5

Digital Spy: 4/5

AppTudes: "There aren’t a whole lot of racing games in the App Store that take place in the future, but AXL: Full Boost fills the void nicely with its light science-fiction story and aesthetics."

AVRMagazine.com: "Un fantastico gioco di gare con navicelle spaziali dalla grafica perfetta e dalla velocissima giocabilità."

In 2184, four years after the Polis Incident, you have the one chance to get your reputation back by racing the AXL division with a sponsor.
Join the championship: get ready to boost and unveil the truth beneath corporate plots!

official trailer:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dbpNdhCnRso&feature=plcp

Game features:
- 71 Races in career mode (Starcade);
- 3 Game Modes (Starcade, Free Run, Custom Race);
- 16 Tracks;
- 7 Locations;
- 12 Shape-Changing Shifters (racing vehicles);
- Impressive graphics;
- Arcade gameplay;
Innovative "boost economy": collect orbs and use them to boost, but watch out: when you boost, you release the orbs and your opponents will be able to use them!
Watch your racing "shifter" transform to change shape: race, brake, boost.
Win races to gain fame points that will give you access to new tracks and unlock new shifters.

Created by the multiple-award winning developer SpinVector, co-produced by Palzoun, uses technology by Raylight Games.
